title: since when did they buff nami?
body:
i played her back in season 3 with some success, went to play her today and everything is kinda beefed up, especially her passive, 40 ms for 1.5 sec!? used to be 15 for 1 second..... also her bubble projectile speed is stupid fast, i had to stop leading bubbles so much...


the freelo mermaid is freelo.
